009
010package imagingbook.pub.color.filters;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterScalar;
017import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
018import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
019
020/**
021 * Ordinary (scalar) median filter for color images implemented
022 * by extending the {@link GenericFilter} class.
023 * Color images are filtered individually in all channels.
024 * 
025 * @author W. Burger
026 * @version 2020/12/31
027 */
028public class ScalarMedianFilter extends GenericFilterScalar {
029        
030        final Parameters params;
031        final CircularMask mask;
032        final int maskCount;
033        final int xc, yc;
034        final int[][] maskArray;
035        final float[] supportRegion;
036        final int medianIndex;
037        
038        
039        public ScalarMedianFilter(ImageProcessor ip) {
040                this(new Parameters());
041        }
042        
043        public ScalarMedianFilter(Parameters params) {
044                this.params = params;
045                this.mask = new CircularMask(params.radius);
046                this.maskCount = mask.getCount();
047                this.xc = this.yc = mask.getCenter();
048                this.maskArray = mask.getMask();
049                this.supportRegion = new float[maskCount];
050                this.medianIndex = maskCount/2;
051        }
052
053        public static class Parameters {
054                /** Filter radius */
055                public double radius = 3.0;
056                /** Out-of-bounds strategy */
057                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
058        }
059
060        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
061        
062        @Override
063        protected float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v) {
064                int k = 0;
065                for (int i = 0; i < maskArray.length; i++) {
066                        int ui = u + i - xc;
067                        for (int j = 0; j < maskArray[0].length; j++) {
068                                if (maskArray[i][j] > 0) {
069                                        int vj = v + j - yc;
070                                        supportRegion[k] = plane.getVal(ui, vj);
071                                        k = k + 1;
072                                }
073                        }
074                }
075                Arrays.sort(supportRegion);
076                return supportRegion[medianIndex];
077        }
078}
